description: Main entry point and core app structure for a Flutter-based bookstore frontend, including UI components, state management, models, and mock data/repository for a bookstore platform.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines the color palette used throughout the app.

classes.name: Book
classes.description: Model representing a book with details like title, author, category, cover URL, etc.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Model representing an item in the shopping cart.

classes.name: MockBookRepository
classes.description: Simulates API calls to fetch books, categories, and search results.

classes.name: CatalogState
classes.description: State management for catalog search, filter, and sort functionalities.

classes.name: CartState
classes.description: State management for shopping cart operations.

classes.name: BookStoreApp
classes.description: Root widget of the app that sets up providers and theme.

classes.name: RootNav
classes.description: Main bottom navigation widget for switching between pages.

classes.name: HomePage
classes.description: Displays featured books and the hero banner.

classes.name: CatalogPage
classes.description: Book browsing page with search, filter, and sorting capabilities.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: UI component representing a book in grid or featured list.

classes.name: BookDetailPage
classes.description: Detailed view of a single book, with option to add to cart.

classes.name: CartPage
classes.description: Displays items added to cart with options to modify.

classes.name: CheckoutPage
classes.description: Mock checkout form with order summary and confirmation.

classes.name: ProfilePage
classes.description: User profile view with mock profile info and options.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the Flutter app.

methods.name: imageProviderFor
methods.description: Returns an image provider; MemoryImage for tests, NetworkImage otherwise.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs the ThemeData for the app with custom colorScheme and component styles.
